name: CyberKnights of the Neon Table
description:
Sire! Mordred has invaded our wondrous city of Camelot seeking the Holy Grail for his ungodly ambitions. We have used all military forces stalling his army at the city walls, but some of his forces have slipped through and are seeking to destroy the Excalibur, where the Grail resides. We need you in the sky, venerable CyberKnight. Protect the Excalibur!

Features :
  • Choose from over 100s different loadout combinations!
  • Fly through a futuristic Cyberpunk City in pixel art
  • Choose your pilot and use their unique abilities to the fullest
  • Shoot down multiple enemies within a short period of time to accumulate combo points and beat your high score!
  • Destroy incoming missiles and protect the Excalibur
